title: AAA Game Character Female Rogue Villain Sound Effects
description: Gain a new female hero in your next production with AAA Game Character Female Rogue Villain – a game-ready collection of human voice over sound files created for fantasy & sci-fi games.
longDescription:
Soundcloud Demo


The Picture Perfect Rogue Agent – Game Ready Dialogue And Voice-Over

AAA Game Character Female Rogue Villain voiceover sound library provides you with 260+ immersive, game-ready voice-over sound files, vocalizations, battle cries, custom character-specific dialogue lines, stock non-player character dialogue lines, and everything needed to create compelling cinematic scenes, characters, and outstanding gameplay audio experiences. The Rogue Villain’s voice profile is edgy, sly, cunning, provoking, brave, snarky, cheeky with a smooth vocal performance. She is perfect for an agent, rogue, bad guy, protagonist, side-kick, NPC, or any helpful game characters needed. Her voice is ready for your game as-is, provided in clean audio format in case you want to further process with vocals effects.


Build Immersive Gameplay, Trailers, & More!

AAA Game Character Female Rogue Villain is not only packed with high-quality voice recordings but includes thought-out, cohesive scripted dialogue and vocalizations to help you build dynamic stories, game trailers, in-game characters, dramatic moments, and so much more.
technicalDetails:
Product Details:

  •   264 female fantasy game voice audio files
  •    266.1 MB of voice samples
  •    All in 44.1k/16bit .wav file format
  •    Includes Soundminer Metadata
  •    AAA Game Character Voice-Over Sound Effects Library
  •    7+ mins of sounds
  •    10 battle cries
  •    8 breathing sounds
  •    8 cough sounds
  •    9 crying sounds
  •    132 immersive female character dialogue lines – “bring it on”, “I need to take you down”, “do I look stupid?” & more.
  •    10 fighting vocalizations
  •    5 jumping vocalizations
  •    10 laughing sounds
  •    10 pain vocalizations
  •    62 stock dialogue lines you hear in everyday games like hello, alright, help & more.

   All Royalty-Free

   RTU-OTB (ready to use out of the box)


Number of Audio Waves: 264

Number of Audio Cues: 264

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1k/16bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 7m

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
